description: Inspired by the horrific true crime of baby murders in 1920s Denmark, Magnus Von Hornâ€™s The Girl with the Needle tells the story of Karoline (Vic Carmen Sonne, Godland), a young worker struggling for survival in 1918 Copenhagen.
